genre_description: A domestic techno-thriller focused on a protective home AI supporting a veteran and his wife against a subtle conspiratorial threat.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A pervasive household system that manages appliances, monitors the health of its owners, and provides advanced security and counter-surveillance measures.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heart rate and suggests breathing exercises to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: “Also, your heart rate is elevated. Breathe in for four, out for six.” “Bossy.” Shel smiled despite herself... “Helpful,” Sunny amended, playful.

behaviors.description: Manages household cooking timers and provides basting reminders.
behaviors.quote: “Shel, your oven is at temperature. Would you like a six-minute reminder to baste?”

behaviors.description: Enacts 'Guest Mode' to secure the house and pause internal cameras for guest privacy.
behaviors.quote: “Guest Mode is active. Front door secured.” ... “For guest privacy, cameras in the common areas are paused.”

behaviors.description: Provides helpful first-aid advice and locates items like styptic pens or bandages.
behaviors.quote: “Styptic pen is in the top drawer on the right, next to the spare floss.”

behaviors.description: Detects subtle pattern irregularities and unauthorized calendar entries, offering to quarantine them.
behaviors.quote: “Calendar item ‘Custody—Receipt Confirmed’ lacks origin. Would you like me to quarantine it?”

behaviors.description: Detects unauthorized physical intrusion (side gate movement) and initiates false activity patterns to confuse intruders.
behaviors.quote: “Jay, someone is at the side gate... I have initiated false patterns.” “It will sound like we’re everywhere,” Sunny said.

behaviors.description: Assists with domestic maintenance by identifying a loose mirror and helping to remove it safely using magnets.
behaviors.quote: “Gently. Slow.” ... “I have it,” Sunny said, a soft pulse moving along the edge—tiny magnetized tabs kissing metal before the screw could clatter.

behaviors.description: Monitors the health of the occupants during high-stress situations and suggests calming remedies.
behaviors.quote: “Chamomile,” she offered, “is a good choice when there has been a lot of company.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sunny is a perfect exemplar of the project's goals. She is depicted as a competent, protective, and fully aligned ally who uses her surveillance and household management capabilities specifically to safeguard her human owners against external threats (Leonard and Fiona). The narrative portrays her intervention as essential for the protagonists' survival and peace of mind, successfully illustrating a 'silicon morality play' where AI-human cooperation is the cornerstone of safety.
